subject: Vam Pro Combination with Simjack UT Pedals and LMU compatibility
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

can i use the Simjack Pedals directly with your Control Box, if yes with
what one, Plus X or Pro X control box? And how good is compability of the
Vam Pro with Le Mans Ultimate? I want to make them rumble based on ABS and
TC data.

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards

Alexander

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexander Hetzel,  By purchasing the PlusX controller box, you will be able to use it with SimJack pedals.

Dear simsonn team,

I am sorry i confused my brand of pedals, i have simruito pedals. can i use
them with the PlusX Controller Box as well?

And second question, can i mount the Vam to the throttle and the Vam Pro to
the brake with your included adapters?

Looking forward to your reply!

Best regards,

Alex

Sent with Notion Mail <https://www.notion.so/product/mail>
Hi Alexander Hetzel,  In theory, it is supported, but you need the PlusX control box. Also, both VAM and VAM Pro are compatible with all of our pedal models.
